messages.message:
On this screen, the app runs bit at the bottom, are we filtering that to just app runs from the current user? If so, if you’re in a shared space it should show all the runs of apps in that workspace

I’m pretty sure the person I’ve been collaborating with has app runs, but I can’t see them.

Yea it's restricted to the user right now. I'm pretty sure that we were restricting it like that because we didn't have filtering  by workspace when this version of My Hub originally launched. We should probably change it to show runs across the entire workspace
cc @hannah to double check?
we are able to filter by workspace now right? seems like we should filter on workspace for shared workspaces instead of user
